cards.rules_text: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them onto the battlefield tapped. If you don't, put a card from among them into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
cards.flavor_text: [i]Einos was built with the best of intentions.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Target opponent discards two cards. Put up to one land card discarded this way onto the battlefield tapped under your control.

cards.flavor_text: [i]After the closure of Einos' portals, mortals had to be summoned to travel, a process said to erode the self and align the will with that of the summoning planeswalker's.[/i]

cards.rules_text: Return up to two target creature and/or planeswalker cards from your graveyard to your hand. Create two 1/1 black Demon creature tokens.
